بِسْمِ اللهِ الرَّحْمٰنِ الرَّحِيْمِ

## َّحْمٰنِ الرَّحِيْمِ 

Our objective, with Religious dewdrops, is to distill complex religious, sociological, and historical research articles into succinct, memorable narratives.  

We hope to make knowledge more accessible and understandable for everyone (especially those of us leading busy lives), while helping writers reach a wider audience too, God willing.  

We believe that religious, sociological, and historical knowledge has the potential to better our lives and our society as a whole.  

We ask God to help us in this endeavour.
